body.p: 1. Hebrew soldier who distinguished himself by killing a Philistine giant. In one passage he is named as the son of Jaare-oregim of Bethlehem, and is said to have killed Goliath the Gittite (2 Sm 21:19). In another passage he is named as the son of Jair, and is said to have killed Lahmi, the brother of Goliath (1 Chr 20:5).
2. Dodo’s son and warrior among King David’s mighty men (2 Sm 23:24; 1 Chr 11:26).
